main event: A pilot observed an unidentified object with 15 circular swirls of light on film while at Point Mugu, California, on March 23, 1957.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 30 minutes,The object was described as having a circular shape with 15 equal sides and having a whitish color,The object moved rapidly with no sound or trail and disappeared approximately 10 seconds after being filmed.,An unidentified high-performance aircraft was reported in the area just before the sighting.,The evaluation of the object was deemed not possible.
sighted object: an irregularly shaped object with 15 circular swirls of light
